name: MutantCars
description:
Motivation

MutantCars is based on a previous work called "DieselGate The game" and that project has been adapted for participating in  #SaveTheEnvironmentGameJam

Description

It is a TAP&HIT game where you have to destroy all the mutantcars for saving the world.

Story

There is a big threat living with us, it's present in our streets and it's present in our houses, this threat is the gas !!

The gases of those mutantcars are contaminating our air. We need a brave to destroy all of them before they finish with all the life over the world. We trust you for this mission...

Hurry up is a matter of TIME !!

Enjoy it.

Age rating ( Everyone )
